com.company

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.company.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    The Player class is consisted of a players data in the game , Which is its color value and list of tokens it has . Each player can be either white or black , in this game the first player is always considered white and 2nd player is considered black . In game with computer second player is the computer which as mentioned , is considered black .

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player(int colorValue, int x, int y)
      Makes a new player with the given x and y and also its color value .

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(int colorValue,
              int x,
              int y)
        Makes a new player with the given x and y and also its color value . The given x and y are for the first tokens which are in the center . for white player is (4,4) and (5,5) and for black is (5,4) and (4,5) . The color value is the unicode chosen for the tokens of the player .
        Parameters:
        colorValue - color value of tokens for the player
        x - X and Y of the first tokens of the player , which are the tokens in the center .
        y - X and Y of the first tokens of the player , which are the tokens in the center .

        Returns:

      • getColorValue

        public int getColorValue()

      • addToken

        public void addToken(Token newToken)
        adds a new token to list of tokens for a player . (All of the conditions are checked in addNewToken method in PlayingSystem class .
        Parameters:
        newToken - new token to be added

      • getNumberOfTokens

        public int getNumberOfTokens()
        gets the number of all tokens for a player
        Returns:
        number of tokens
